name: AI Snowball Scholool
description:
"In AI Snowball Scholool, you play as a teacher fighting against misbehaving schoolkids in a snowballfight around Christmas. Made with ChatGPT, Stable Diffusion, Dreamfusion, MonsterMash, jsfxr, and PIFuHD, this holiday-themed action game will keep you on the edge of your seat as you use WASD to move and the left mouse button to shoot snowballs. Don't run out of ammo – use the right mouse button to recharge.

This description was written by ChatGPT and we wish you happy holidays and lots of fun as you play AI Snowball Scholool! "

ChatGPT (Code & Text)

Stable Diffusion (Textures, Map Layout)

Dreamfusion (Tree Prompt to 3D Model)

MonsterMash (2D to 3D Models)

PIFuHD (2D Character to 3D Model)

jsfxr (8Bit SoundFX Generation)

Animations by Adobe Mixamo

Promptcrafters: Enrie & Plusma
